description: This Java source file defines the LightDeviceShell class, which provides shell commands to manage MockLight devices within a Zigbee simulation environment. It includes methods to list, add, turn on/off, toggle, and set levels for lights, and a nested class for name provisioning.

classes.name: LightDeviceShell
classes.description: A shell component providing commands to manage light devices.

classes.name: NameValueProvider
classes.description: A nested class that provides device names for command parameters.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all registered light devices in a table format.

methods.name: addLight
methods.description: Adds a new Light device with the specified name.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the state of the specified light.

methods.name: level
methods.description: Sets the light level for the specified light, with validation for range 0-100.
